doc:
Kate Burton (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kate_Burton_(actress) 0 Katherine "Kate" Burton (born September 10, 1957) is a Swiss-born British-American actress, daughter of actor Richard Burton and Sybil Burton. On television, Burton received critical acclaim for performances in Shonda Rhimes's drama series as Ellis Grey on Grey's Anatomy, and as Vice President Sally Langston on Scandal. She has been nominated for three Primetime Emmy Awards and three Tony Awards. Katherine_"_Kate_"_Burton ( born September_10_,_1957 ) is a_Swiss-born_British-American_actress , daughter of actor_Richard_Burton and Sybil_Burton . She has_been_nominated for three_Primetime_Emmy_Awards and three_Tony_Awards .
